dt-option.name: searchCols
dt-option.summary: Define an initial search for individual columns.
dt-option.description:
Basically the same as the `-init search` option, but in this case for individual columns, rather than the global filter, this option defined the filtering to apply to the table during initialisation.
The array must be of the same size as the number of columns, and each element be an object with the parameters `search`, `regex` (optional, default `false`) and `smart` (optional, default `true`). `null` is also accepted and the default will be used. See the `-init search` documentation for more information on these parameters.
